Assignment 1 :

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed
        example e;
        try{
            e=example.valueOf(t1.getText());
            e.print(e.y,t1.getText(),e.d);
            des.setText(e.str);
        }
        catch(Exception x){
            des.setText("ERROR");
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"language is not found");
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed
        System.exit(0);
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed

    private void t1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_t1ActionPerformed

    }//GEN-LAST:event_t1ActionPerformed
 
    interface ooc{
       public void print(int Y,String L,String DEV);
        public boolean isooc();
   }
   
    public static enum example implements ooc{
         
        C(1972,"Dennis Ritchie",false),CPP(1979,"Bjarne Stroustrup",true),Java(1995,"James Gosling",true),Python(1991,"guido van Rossum",true);
        example(int year,String dev,boolean flag){
            y=year;
            d=dev;
            f=flag;
        }
        @Override 
        public boolean isooc(){
            return f;
        }
        @Override 
        public void print(int Y,String L,String DEV){
            str=(L+((isooc())?" is a ":" not an ")+"object oriented language"+",\nthis was introduced in the year "+y+",\n by "+d);
        }
         int y;
         String d,str;
         boolean f;
    } 
    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        /* Set the Nimbus look and feel */
        //<editor-fold defaultstate="collapsed" desc=" Look and feel setting code (optional) ">
        /* If Nimbus (introduced in Java SE 6) is not available, stay with the default look and feel.
         * For details see http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/lookandfeel/plaf.html 
         */
        try {
            for (javax.swing.UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo info : javax.swing.UIManager.getInstalledLookAndFeels()) {
                if ("Nimbus".equals(info.getName())) {
                    javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(info.getClassName());
                    break;
                }
            }
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(try1.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (InstantiationException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(try1.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (IllegalAccessException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(try1.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(try1.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        }
        //</editor-fold>

        /* Create and display the form */
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new Ass1().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assignment 2 :

package ass2;

import java.util.StringTokenizer;

public class Ass2 {

	@SuppressWarnings("unused")
	public static void main(String[] args) {
//		1. Construct an array of Alphabets  
		char chr1 [] = {'a','b','c','d','e','f'};
		System.out.println("\n1)\n" + new String(chr1));
		
//		2. Construct a string containing  s and n  (or S and N)  
		String str2 = new String ("SN");
		System.out.println("\n2)\n" + str2);
		
//		3. Form another string with data “computer science” 
		String str3 = "computer science";
		System.out.println("\n3)\n" + str3);
		
//		4. Extract First letter of each word from Q3 
		String str4 = "";
		StringTokenizer stok = new StringTokenizer(str3," ");
		while(stok.hasMoreTokens()) 
			str4 += stok.nextToken().charAt(0);
		System.out.println("\n4)\n" + str4);
		
//		5. Convert the string (ref qn 4) to upper case 
		String str5 = str4.toUpperCase();
		System.out.println("\n5)\n" + str5);
		
//		6. Form a string 17 from an Input a integer 17  
		String str6 = String.valueOf(17);
		System.out.println("\n6)\n" + str6);
		
//		7. Input your roll number leading  0 ( for roll number 9 it should not be 009 or 09)
		String str7 = "37";
		System.out.println("\n7)\n" + str7);
		
//		8. Form three digit roll number from Q7 ( example for 9 it should be 009, for 90 it should be 090)
		String str8 = new String(str7);
		while(str8.length()<3)
			str8 = "0"+str8;
		System.out.println("\n8)\n" + str8);
		
//		9. Concatenate strings formed from Q2 , Q6,Q5  and Q8 with 4 (expected ex: result 4SN17CS090)
		String str9 = "4"+str2+str6+str5+str8;
		System.out.println("\n9)\n" + str9);
		
//		10. Input  your name  (Example Sharathchandra) 
		String str10 = "sampath";
		System.out.println("\n10)\n" + str10);
		
//		11. Form Short name consisting 4 characters of Q10 and form its Upper case   SHAR 
		String str11 = str10.substring(0, 4).toUpperCase();
		System.out.println("\n11)\n" + str11);
		
//		12. Form a string by concatenating Q11_Q9@sitmng.in ( SHAR_4SN17CS090@sitmng.in) 
		String str12 = str11+"_"+str9+"@sitmng.in";
		System.out.println("\n12)\n" + str12);
		
//		13. Read your mail id – should check is google user id or not  
		String str13 = "sampath@gmail.com";
		System.out.println("\n13)\n" + str13);
		if(str13.endsWith("@gmail.com"))
			System.out.println("Is A Google Account");
		else
			System.out.println("Is Not A Google Account");
			
//		14. Find the length of Q13 , if it exceed 20 print its big mail id.
		System.out.println("\n14)\n" + str13);
		if(str13.length()>20)
			System.out.println("is a Big mail id");
		
//		15. Read a subject code and find out whether  it is a lab subject of not ( ex 17CS51….17CSL58 , 17CS553)
		String str15 = "17CSL58";
		System.out.println("\n15)\n" + str15);
		if(str15.contains("CSL"))
			System.out.println("Is A Lab Subject");
		else
			System.out.println("Is Not A Lab Subject");
		
//		16. From Q12 print individual character by copying into character array. 
		System.out.println("\n16)\n");
		char chr16[] = new char[str12.length()];
		str12.getChars(0, str12.length(), chr16, 0);
		for(char chr:chr16)
			System.out.print(chr);
		System.out.println();
		
//		17. Convert and store Upper case equivalent of Q12 
		String str17 = str12.toUpperCase();
		
		
//		18. Compare  Q17 and Q12  (both ordinary and ignoring case) 
		int int18 = str17.compareToIgnoreCase(str12);
		
//		19. From the string “Delhi IIT Delhi”, determine string starts or end with Delhi
		String str19 = "Delhi IIT Delhi";
		System.out.println("Starts with Delhi:" + str19.startsWith("Delhi"));
		System.out.println("Ends with Delhi:" + str19.endsWith("Delhi"));
		
//		20. From Q12 find the index of @ 
		System.out.println("Index of '@' ("+str12+"): " + str12.indexOf('@'));
		
//		21. Read a mail id, check whether the mail id is Valid or not --using indexof (‘@’) 
		String emailID ="";
		
		
//		22. Read string “SIT,Mangalore PIN: 574143 valachil post “ from this string replace Mangalore by Mangaluru 
		String str22 = "SIT,Mangalore PIN: 574143 valachil post";
		str22.replace("Mangalore", "Mangaluru");
		
//		23. Obtain a sub string  valachil – using suitable substring method 
		String str23 = str22.substring(str22.indexOf("valachil"),str22.indexOf("valachil")+"valachil".length());
		
//		24. Read a string remove  extra spaces  
		String str24 = "   aa   ".trim();
		
//		25. Display only characters at odd places.
		String str25 = " a b c d";
		for(int i=1;i<str25.length();i+=2)
			System.out.print(str25.charAt(i));
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
//		scan.close();
		
		
		

	}

}

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assignment 3 : 

/*
 * To change this license header, choose License Headers in Project Properties.
 * To change this template file, choose Tools | Templates
 * and open the template in the editor.
 */
//package assignment3;

import java.util.Stack;
import javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel;


class Student{
    Student(int ID,String str){
        USN=ID;
        Name = str;
    }
    int USN;
    String Name;
}
public class UI extends javax.swing.JFrame {

    /**
     * Creates new form UI
     */
    String header[] = {"USN","Name"};
    Stack<Student> stk = new Stack<Student>();
    DefaultTableModel mdl;
    
    
    public UI() {
        initComponents();
        
    }

    /**
     * This method is called from within the constructor to initialize the form.
     * WARNING: Do NOT modify this code. The content of this method is always
     * regenerated by the Form Editor.
     */
    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
    // <editor-fold defaultstate="collapsed" desc="Generated Code">//GEN-BEGIN:initComponents
    private void initComponents() {

        jScrollPane1 = new javax.swing.JScrollPane();
        tbl = new javax.swing.JTable();
        btnPeek = new javax.swing.JButton();
        btnPush = new javax.swing.JButton();
        btnPop = new javax.swing.JButton();
        btnClear = new javax.swing.JButton();
        fldID = new javax.swing.JTextField();
        lblID = new javax.swing.JLabel();
        lblName = new javax.swing.JLabel();
        fldName = new javax.swing.JTextField();
        lblSize = new javax.swing.JLabel();
        lblSizeCount = new javax.swing.JLabel();
        lblTblStatus_ = new javax.swing.JLabel();
        lblTblStatus = new javax.swing.JLabel();

        setDefaultCloseOperation(javax.swing.WindowConstants.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);

        tbl.setBorder(javax.swing.BorderFactory.createBevelBorder(javax.swing.border.BevelBorder.RAISED));

        lblTblStatus_.setText("Table Status: ");

        lblTblStatus.setText("Empty");

                .addContainerGap())
        );

        pack();
    }// </editor-fold>//GEN-END:initComponents

    private void btnPushActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnPushActionPerformed
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }//GEN-LAST:event_btnPushActionPerformed

    private void btnPushMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnPushMouseClicked
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        stk.add(new Student(Integer.parseInt(fldID.getText().trim()),fldName.getText()));
        ((DefaultTableModel)tbl.getModel()).addRow(new Object[]{stk.peek().USN,stk.peek().Name});
        lblSizeCount.setText(String.valueOf(stk.size()));
        lblTblStatus.setText("Item Added!");
        
    }//GEN-LAST:event_btnPushMouseClicked

    private void btnPopMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnPopMouseClicked
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        try{
            ((DefaultTableModel)tbl.getModel()).removeRow(stk.size()-1);
            stk.pop();
            lblTblStatus.setText("Item Popped!");
            lblSizeCount.setText(String.valueOf(stk.size()));
        }catch(Exception e){lblTblStatus.setText("UnderFlow!");}
    }//GEN-LAST:event_btnPopMouseClicked

    private void btnPeekMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnPeekMouseClicked
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        try{
            lblTblStatus.setText("Item Retrived!");
            fldID.setText(String.valueOf(stk.peek().USN));
            fldName.setText(stk.peek().Name);
        }catch(Exception e){ lblTblStatus.setText("No Item in Table");}
        
        
    }//GEN-LAST:event_btnPeekMouseClicked

    private void btnClearMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_btnClearMouseClicked
        lblTblStatus.setText("Table Cleared!");
        ((DefaultTableModel)tbl.getModel()).setRowCount(0);
        stk.clear();
        fldID.setText("");
        fldName.setText("");
        lblSizeCount.setText(String.valueOf(stk.size()));
    }//GEN-LAST:event_btnClearMouseClicked

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */

         */
        try {
            for (javax.swing.UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo info : javax.swing.UIManager.getInstalledLookAndFeels()) {
                if ("Nimbus".equals(info.getName())) {
                    javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(info.getClassName());
                    break;
                }
            }
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(UI.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (InstantiationException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(UI.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (IllegalAccessException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(UI.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(UI.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        }
        //</editor-fold>

        /* Create and display the form */
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new UI().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }

    // Variables declaration - do not modify//GEN-BEGIN:variables
    private javax.swing.JButton btnClear;
    private javax.swing.JButton btnPeek;
    private javax.swing.JButton btnPop;
    private javax.swing.JButton btnPush;
    private javax.swing.JTextField fldID;
    private javax.swing.JTextField fldName;
    private javax.swing.JScrollPane jScrollPane1;
    private javax.swing.JLabel lblID;
    private javax.swing.JLabel lblName;
    private javax.swing.JLabel lblSize;
    private javax.swing.JLabel lblSizeCount;
    private javax.swing.JLabel lblTblStatus;
    private javax.swing.JLabel lblTblStatus_;
    private javax.swing.JTable tbl;
    // End of variables declaration//GEN-END:variables
}
